categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: DVL-181, nicknamed Quagmire, was a Rebel Alliance starfighter base built on a remote swampy planet, located in the Aracara Testing Facility, an abandoned weapons laboratory. The X-wings of Silverblade squadron were stationed at Quagmire. The outpost used a LongView-382.X long-range sensor array and was used as a corporate weapons and material testing zone. When it proved to be unprofitable, it was abandoned.
